byline.original: By JOHN ELIGON and SERGE F. KOVALESKI
byline.contributor: Lori Rotenberk contributed reporting from Chicago, Sheila M. Eldred from Minnesota, Joe Coscarelli and Alan Schwarz from New York, and Azam Ahmed from Mexico City.

lead_paragraph: Officials in Minnesota said the singer sustained an accidental overdose of self-administered fentanyl, a type of synthetic opiate.

headline.print_headline: Prince Died of Accidental Overdose of Painkiller, Autopsy Finds
headline.main: Prince Died From Accidental Overdose of Opioid Painkiller

snippet: Officials in Minnesota said the singer sustained an accidental overdose of self-administered fentanyl, a type of synthetic opiate.
abstract: Officials in Minnesota say autopsy finds Prince died from accidental overdose of self-administered synthetic opiate fentanyl; musician battled debilitating hip pain during his career; authorities have not addressed how he had access to drug and whether it was prescribed by doctor.
